item.description:
What better to do on a chilly afternoon than to gather around the campfire to learn about the creatures that live in our forest? Come to the Myles Standish Amphitheater where we’ll provide a warm campfire, some interesting activities, an optional short hike (1:15pm - 1:45pm), hot chocolate, and marshmallows. Feel free to come and go as you please - stay for a few minutes or join us for the whole time. Bring your family and friends for this program that will surely warm you up!

Please dress in warm clothes and winter boots, and you may want to bring some warm blankets to sit upon and wrap up in.

For all ages.

Program meets at the Myles Standish State Forest Amphitheater behind headquarters at 194 Cranberry Road, South Carver. Rain, snow storm, or very icy conditions will cancel. Please call (508) 866-2580 x 162 for more information. For park information and directions, please visit http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/southeast/mssf.htm.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Winter Campfire Fun!
